1.0.1.en: Changed app-icon and added better description

1.0.3.en: Pushover app now supports Sound and Priority.

1.0.4.en: Default value on settings not configured. Getting a lot of crash-reports, due to missing Settings.

1.0.8.en: Handling of missing Token. Error replaced.

1.0.10.en: Card with URL and Image combined added.

1.0.11.en: New card added. Combination with url and priority added.

1.0.14.en: Retry and Expire added to Priority.
